question_text_en: What is the shortest duration for an agent that reads an object which is a subclass of Props in the bedroom for less than or equal to 20 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:read .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 20)
            
                        
                    }

qualifiers_en.time: less than or equal to 20 seconds

qualifiers_en.question: What is the shortest duration?

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the action performed by an agent that wipes an object which is a subclass of Props at a position where the X coordinate is less than 6.55 for more than or equal to 3 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("6.55"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 3)
            
                        
                    }

question_text_en: How many times does an agent switch off an object whose state is ON in the bedroom in less than 8 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:ON .
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 8)
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                    }

question_text_en: What is the longest duration involving an agent that scrubs an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -3.81 for more than 1 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-3.81"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 1)
            
                        
                    }

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the agent writing on an object whose state is GRABED in the livingroom from 2024-04-02T20:53:00 to 2024-04-22T03:14:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-02T20:53:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-22T03:14:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .

                    }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Wineglass .
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-13T20:31:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-08T16:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

question_text_en: What is the total duration for which an agent drinks an object whose width is greater than 0.09m in the livingroom from 2024-05-08T05:07:00 to 2024-06-28T06:42:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x > 0.09)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-08T05:07:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-28T06:42:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>

question_text_en: What is the average Y coordinate of an object whose state is GRABED that an agent puts at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -1.86 for less than or equal to 11 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?pos_y) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:put .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 11)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-1.86"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

question_text_en: What is the total duration for an agent that closes an object which is a subclass of Appliances in the kitchen for less than 13 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .

                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 13)
            
                        
                    }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:sit .
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-30T18:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-25T05:20:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    } group by ?object

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.2)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-10.23"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-03T14:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-04T11:38:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .

                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .

question_text_en: What is the average X coordinate of an object whose state is GRABED put in by an agent at a position where the Z coordinate is less than 0.79 just before closing the microwave316?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?pos_x) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
                        
                    {
                        select distinct * where {
                            ?event vh2kg:nextEvent ?next_event .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:mainObject ?next_object .
                            ?next_object rdfs:label "microwave" .
                            ?event vh2kg:eventNumber ?event_number .
                        } order by desc(?event_number) limit 1
                    }
                    
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("0.79"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MAX(?pos_x) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:sit .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-20T22:33:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-21T13:46:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.17"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.81)
                
                        
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                    }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time .
                    ?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent drink an object whose width is less than or equal to 0.44m in the livingroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:drink .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x <= 0.44)
                
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-7.36"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .

question_text_en: How long does an agent take to wipe an object whose state is GRABED in the bedroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time .
                    ?time time:numericDuration ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent close an object which is a subclass of Appliances in the kitchen?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the activity involving an agent that rinses an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -4.88 from 2024-06-21T02:35:00 to 2024-06-30T03:21:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-21T02:35:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-30T03:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-4.88"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        ?answer vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the next activity involving an agent that puts in an object whose width is less than 0.69m at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.59 before closing the fridge308?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:putIn .
                        
                    {
                        select distinct * where {
                            ?event vh2kg:nextEvent+ ?next_event .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                            ?next_event vh2kg:mainObject ?next_object .
                            ?next_object rdfs:label "fridge" .
                            ?event vh2kg:eventNumber ?event_number .
                        } order by desc(?event_number) limit 1
                    }
                    
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x < 0.69)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.59"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                    ?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    ?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:

                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-07T07:05:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-17T14:45:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z > 0.45)
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose depth is greater than 0.45m
qualifiers_en.question: What is the place?

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:read .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object that an agent is currently eating and whose state is GRABED?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:eat .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 6)
            
                    }  }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent rinses an object whose depth is less than or equal to 0.57m after 2024-05-20T07:50:00 and before or at 2024-06-17T02:32:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z <= 0.57)
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-20T07:50:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-17T02:32:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent writes on an object whose state is GRABED firstly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent lastly scrubs an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.34m?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:scrub .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.34)
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                    } order by desc(?end_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera0 involving an agent that grabs an object whose depth is greater than 0.29m inside the bedroom from 2024-06-15T15:24:00 to 2024-07-04T18:56:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:grab .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-15T15:24:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-04T18:56:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z > 0.29)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "bedroom" .
            
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera2 involving an agent that wipes an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.93 for more than 4 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 4)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.93"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera3 involving an agent that pours an object which is a subclass of Props inside the kitchen for more than 15 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 15)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera3_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-26T12:34:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-15T12:03:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera4_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-08T12:37:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-07-05T03:39:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("6.72"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera2 involving an agent that switches off an object whose depth is less than or equal to 0.62m at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 2.06 after or at 2024-05-01T01:58:00 and before 2024-05-10T04:54:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-01T01:58:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-10T04:54:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z <= 0.62)
                
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("2.06"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera2 showing an agent that soaks an object which is a subclass of Props in the kitchen after 2024-04-25T01:28:00 and before 2024-05-29T21:56:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-25T01:28:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-29T21:56:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 6)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z > 0.12)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-3.11"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera0 showing an agent that closes an object whose width is greater than 0.47m in the kitchen for more than or equal to 1 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 1)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x > 0.47)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:put .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-17T15:16:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-11T21:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera4_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

question_text_en: What are the objects and their bounding boxes in the last video frame from camera2 involving an agent that rinses an object whose depth is less than 0.85m at a position where the Z coordinate is less than 1.74 after or at 2024-04-22T05:29:00 and before 2024-05-05T18:21:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (Max(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                            ?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
                            
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-22T05:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-05T18:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                            
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z < 0.85)
                
                            
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("1.74"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
                    ?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
                            vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;
                        vh2kg:is2DbboxOf ?visible_object .
                }

PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>

            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:type .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-04T16:49:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-04-23T10:46:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .

                    filter(?size_z <= 0.58)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1
