question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera3 involving an agent that closes an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.96m at a position where the Y coordinate is less than 1.17 for less than or equal to 12 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 12)
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.96)
                
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.17"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera3_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera1 involving an agent that switches on an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.51m at a position where the X coordinate is greater than -3.05 for less than 22 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOn .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 22)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.51)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-3.05"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera4 involving an agent that shakes an object whose height is less than or equal to 0.35m in the livingroom for more than 0 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 0)
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y <= 0.35)
                
                                
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera4_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera1 involving an agent that closes an object which is a subclass of Appliances in the kitchen after or at 2024-04-25T15:43:00 and before 2024-06-10T08:34:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-25T15:43:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-10T08:34:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What is the video from camera0 involving an agent that brushes an object whose width is less than 0.9m at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than 0.81 for more than 12 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:brush .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 12)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x < 0.9)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("0.81"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera1 involving an agent that turns to an object whose height is less than 1.0m at a position where the Z coordinate is less than 2.53 for less than 14 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 14)
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y < 1.0)
                
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("2.53"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>

            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:read .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-27T12:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-07T06:56:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                                
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("-8.51"^^xsd:double < ?pos_x)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera3_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .
                } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                FILTER(?duration < 11)

                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration <= 7)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                        
                ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event .
                ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ;
                    sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera0_scene1 ;
                    vh2kg:video ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?visible_object ?pos2d WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (Min(?num) AS ?minNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                            ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                            
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-06T02:27:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-07T09:15:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                            
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                            
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("1.22"^^xsd:double > ?pos_y)
                
                    
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera1_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?bbox .
                    ?bbox a mssn:BoundingBoxDescriptor ;
                            vh2kg:bbox-2d-value ?pos2d ;
                        vh2kg:is2DbboxOf ?visible_object .
                }

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?minFrame ?maxFrame WHERE {
                    {
                        SELECT ?vs (MIN(?num) AS ?minNum) (MAX(?num) AS ?maxNum)
                        WHERE {
                            { SELECT * WHERE {
                                ?event vh2kg:action ac:rinse .
                                
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 15)
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                                
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
                
                            } }
                            ?vs vh2kg:isVideoSegmentOf ?event ;
                                mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?frame .
                            ?md mssn:hasMediaSegment ?vs ; sosa:madeBySensor ex:camera2_scene1 .
                            ?frame vh2kg:frameNumber ?num .
                        } GROUP BY ?vs limit 1
                    }
                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?minFrame .
                    ?minFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?minNum .

                    ?vs mssn:hasMediaDescriptor ?maxFrame .
                    ?maxFrame vh2kg:frameNumber ?maxNum .

question_text_en: What did the agent do at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -5.49 involving an object which is a subclass of Props lastly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
            
                        } order by desc(?end_time) }
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-5.49"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object whose state is GRABED in the livingroom from 2024-06-01T14:45:00 to 2024-06-26T04:54:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>

            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-01T14:45:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-26T04:54:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>

                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .

query:

            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y < 0.65)

                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "livingroom" .

                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-20T15:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-27T12:02:00"^^xsd:dateTime)

query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x >= 0.17)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 2)
            
                        }  }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .

                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x .
                    filter(?size_x < 0.5)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-01T02:40:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-07T03:52:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?

paraphrased_question_text_en: What did the agent do with the object that was less than 0.5 meters wide in the kitchen between 2:40 a.m. on May 1, 2024, and 3:52 a.m. on June 7, 2024?
